short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension improves the workflow for our services.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Index Solutions provides data cleaning services to professional service firms. This extension is used internally by Index Employees and Contractors to simplify some of the workflow, e.g. opening and closing tabs with related information to a work task, extracting data from the related information, tracking time spent on a task.
This extension is not meant to be used by the general public.
